subject: International Conference Invitation: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
body:
Having trouble viewing this email? click here: http://viewpage.benchmarkemail.com/c/v?e=460BA2&c=58E8F&l=32714B0&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=483324FE This Email has been sent to "foaad@calpoly.edu" because your research profile match with the Theme of the Conference Institute of Research Engineers and Doctors would like to invite you to “International Conference on Advances in Management, Economics and Social Science – MES 2014” Istituto degli Ingegneri e dei Dottori di Ricerca vorrei invitarvi a "International Conference on Advances in Management, Economia e Scienze Sociali - MES 2014" Official Website: [1] www.mes.theired.org Conference Date: 07-08 June, 2014 Early Bird Round Important Dates: Abstract/ Full paper Submission: 27 March 2014 Paper Notification: 08 April 2014 Camera Ready Copy/ Paper Registration: 23 April 2014 Conference City: Rome, Italy Keynote Speakers: -- Dr. Mladen Rajko, University of Zadar, Croatia -- Dr Anna Saiti, Harokopio University, Greece -- Dr. Kresimir Grgic¸University of Osijek, Croatia Research Topics but not limited to: Social Study / Social Science • Social and Community Studies • Civic and Political Studies • Cultural Studies • Global Studies • Environmental Studies • Organizational Studies • Educational Studies • Communication and other related areas Economics • Economic Growth and Job Creation • Business Dynamics • Owner and Business Characteristics • Innovation • Regulatory and Tax Environment • Financing and Access to Capital • Geographic Considerations/Regional Clusters • Globalization and Trade • Emerging Economies and Economic Development • Evidence-Based Policy Analysis • Data and Research Gaps and other related areas Management • Organizations and Technology Management • Production and Operations Management • Project and Quality Management • Purchasing and Supply Management • Decision and Risk Analysis • Contract Management • Knowledge Management • R&D strategies and other related areas For complete list of Research Topics, [2] click hereor visit the official website of the conference For upcoming Conferences in 2014, Kindly [3] click here International Conference Advisory Committee:- Dr. Zelimir William Todorovic Indiana - Purdue University, Fort Wayne United States Prof. Luo Robin Wuhan University China Prof. Paolo Pietro Biancone Turin Italy Dr. PACHA MALYADRI Osmania University India Dr. Claudia Wagner Dublin Institute Of Technology Ireland Dr. FOUAD MEKOUAR École Polytechnique, University Of Montreal, Quebec, Canada Morocco Prof. ARIF A WAQIF Ex University Of Hyderabad India Dr. Srilaxmi Shanmugham Issac Osmania University Ethiopia Prof. Dr. Mamun Habib American International University - Bangladesh (AIUB) Bangladesh Prof. Sonia R. Bentes ISCAL Portugal Prof. Navid Mollaee Univeristy Of Applied Science And Technology Iran Dr. Giuseppe Naples Parthenope Italy Italy Dr. LI FEI Harbin Institute Of Technology China Dr. Bassam Baroma Faculty Of Economics, University Of Rome "Tor-Vergata", Rome, Italy Egypt Dr. Hamid Saremi Islamic Azad University, Quchan Branch Iran Dr. BAG MONARK Institute Of Rural Management Anand India Dr. Donald Henry Ah Pak Xi'an Jiaotong-Liverpool University China Dr. AM RAWANI National Institute Of Technology Raipur India All the registered papers will proudly be published by IRED-CPS and stored in the SEEK digital Library (www.seekdl.org). Each Paper will be assigned DOI (Digital Object Identifier) from CROSSREF. The Proc. will be submitted to ISI Thomson for Review and Indexing. Proc. will also be published in International Journals We Request you to forward this email to your colleagues/Researchers/students in order to promote the conference The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field Please take the time to explore the website for more details, check on important dates, and keep yourself up to date on recent changes Registered Papers (IRED Extended paper guidelines applicable) will be published in the various issues of International journals Prospective authors are invited to submit full (original) research papers; which are NOT submitted or published or under consideration anywhere in other conferences or journals; in electronic (PDF only) format via email About IRED: IRED stands for Institute of Research Engineers and Doctors. IRED headquarter is situated in USA and Cyprus with Registration Number 5372545. IRED organize world class international conferences around the globe in order to provide the platform for sharing the new ideas on upcoming multidisciplinary research areas and to promote the research among the students, researchers, professors and scientists over the globe. IRED and its associated networks websites are being accessed by more than 1 million visitors yearly. IRED is promoting research with more than 75000 student members, more than 55000 associated members and more than 5000 senior and fellow members. IRED Editorial Board consists of more than 5000 Eminent Professors, Scientists and industry professionals in order to published only high quality articles. Each article is being peer reviewed two times before publication in any Conference/Journal. IRED Conference Proceedings is being archived in SEEK Digital Library, where you will be able to see the statistics of any article (abstract views, paper downloaded etc). Each paper published in IRED Conference Proceedings is being provided Digital Object Identifies (DOI) from CROSSREF. The Proceedings is being indexed by Google Scholar and also gets submit to major Indexing service providers like ISI Thomson for further review and indexing Thanks Much NEWS Division IRED References: 1. http://mes.theired.org/ 2. http://mes.theired.org/call_for_paper.html 3. http://www.theired.org/conference_event.html This message was sent to foaad@calpoly.edu by events@theired.org You can modify/update your subscription via the link below Unsubscribe from all mailings http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/su?e=460BA2&c=58E8F&l=32714B0&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=483324FE Manage Subscription http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/s?e=460BA2&c=58E8F&l=32714B0&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=483324FE Forward Email http://www.benchmarkemail.com/c/f?e=460BA2&c=58E8F&l=32714B0&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=483324FE Report Abuse http://www.benchmarkemail.com/Abuse?e=460BA2&c=58E8F&l=32714B0&email=GeKE%2FJi4xv18S7%2B5%2FktOoZB9gYFv4ITk&relid=483324FE IRED, 3905 State Street, Suite 7-313, Santa Barbara, California, USA
Having trouble viewing this email? click here

"Aplogize for multiple copies of this email"

Joint International Conference is being organized by Institute of Research Engineers and Doctors at Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia to bring together innovative acadamics and industrial experts to a common forum.

Track 1: International Conference on Advances in Civil and Structural Engineering - CSE 2014
Official Website: www.cse.theired.org

Track 2: International Conference on Advances in Computing, Electronics and Electrical Technology - CEET 2014
Official Website: www.ceet.theired.org

Track 3: International Conference on Advances in Mechanical, Aeronautical and Production Technologies - MAPT 2014
Official Website: www.mapt.theired.org

Track 4 International Conference on Advances in Applied Science and Environmental Engineering - ASEE 2014
Official Website: www.asee.theired.org

Track 5 International Conference on Advances in Economics, Management & Social Study - EMS 2014
Official Website: www.ems.theired.org

Conference Date: 02-03 August, 2014

Early Bird Round Important Dates:

Abstract/ Full paper Submission: 22 April 2014

Paper Notification: 05 May 2014

Camera Ready Copy/ Paper Registration: 22 May 2014

Conference Venue: Hotel G Tower, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia

Conference Speakers:

-- Dr. Eng. Sattar B. Sadkhan, Babylon University, IRAQ
-- Dr. Chee-Ming Chan, Universiti Tun Hussein Onn Malaysia, MALAYSIA
-- Dr. Ching Yern Chee, University of Malaya(UM), MALAYSIA
-- Dr. Loo Huck Soo, Universiti Teknologi MARA, Malaysia

All the registered papers will proudly be published by IRED-CPS and stored in the SEEK digital Library (www.seekdl.org). Each Paper will be assigned DOI (Digital Object Identifier) from CROSSREF. The Proc. will be submitted to ISI Thomson for Review and Indexing. Proc. will also be published in International Journals with ISSN Numbers.

We Request you to forward this email to your colleagues/Researchers/students in order to promote the conference.

The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and practitioners from both academia as well as industry to meet and share cutting-edge development in the field.
Please take the time to explore the website for more details, check on important dates, and keep yourself up to date on recent changes.

Registered Papers (IRED Extended paper guidelines applicable) will be published in the various issues of International journals.

Prospective authors are invited to submit full (original) research papers; which are NOT submitted or published or under consideration anywhere in other conferences or journals; in electronic (PDF only) format via email.

About IRED:
IRED stands for Institute of Research Engineers and Doctors. IRED headquarter is situated in USA and Cyprus with Registration Number 5372545. IRED organize world class international conferences around the globe in order to provide the platform for sharing the new ideas on upcoming multidisciplinary research areas and to promote the research among the students, researchers, professors and scientists over the globe. IRED and its associated networks websites are being accessed by more than 1 million visitors yearly. IRED is promoting research with more than 75000 student members, more than 55000 associated members and more than 5000 senior and fellow members. IRED Editorial Board consists of more than 5000 Eminent Professors, Scientists and industry professionals in order to published only high quality articles. Each article is being peer reviewed two times before publication in any Conference/Journal. IRED Conference Proceedings is being archived in SEEK Digital Library, where you will be able to see the statistics of any article (abstract views, paper downloaded etc). Each paper published in IRED Conference Proceedings is being provided Digital Object Identifies (DOI) from CROSSREF. The Proceedings is being indexed by Google Scholar and also gets submit to major Indexing service providers like ISI Thomson for further review and indexing.

Thanks Much
E. Richard
NEWS Division
IRED

This message was sent to foaad@calpoly.edu by events@theired.org
